title: Apartment Homes Available *with qualifying income restrictions*
posting_body: ['The Villas at Autumn Hills Apartments is located in Union City and offers a few select apartment homes that are called "LURA" available for rent!', 'In addition to the E & E Capital Management credit, rental and criminal criteria if your income falls within the limits, you may qualify for one of these units:', 'Qualifying low income limits', 'One Person\t$43,900', 'Two Persons\t$50,150', 'Three Persons\t$56,400', 'Four Persons\t$62,650', 'If your income, credit, criminal and rental history qualifies, your rent will be the following:', '1 bedroom $1150', '2 bedroom $1388', 'Please schedule a tour by clicking the link: <URL>', 'Villas At Autumn Hills', '4483 Flat Shoals Road', 'Union City, GA 30291']
